lu.uni.lassy.excalibur.examples.icrash.dev.controller

Class SystemStateController

  • java.lang.Object
    • lu.uni.lassy.excalibur.examples.icrash.dev.controller.SystemStateController

  • public class SystemStateController
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class SystemStateController which controls setting up the initial environment on the server, updating the system time and running crisis handling functions.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Server server
      Parameter that allows the system to gain server access, the server function lives in the model of the client and has RMI calls to access the server.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SystemStateController()

    • Method Detail

      • createSystemAnEnviroment

        public PtBoolean createSystemAnEnviroment(PtInteger numberOfComCompanies)
                                   throws ServerOfflineException,
                                          ServerNotBoundException
        Will tell the server to create the system and environment. This is only called by the Admin window, it has to be ran first
        Parameters:
        numberOfComCompanies - the number of communication companies to create on the server
        Returns:
        Returns if the creation of the system and environment was successful or not
        Throws:
        ServerOfflineException - is an error that is thrown when the server is offline or not reachable
        ServerNotBoundException - is only thrown when attempting to access a server which has no current binding. This shouldn't happen, but you never know!

      • getServerDateTime

        public DtDateAndTime getServerDateTime()
                                throws ServerOfflineException,

        Returns:
        the date and time of the server
        Throws:
        ServerOfflineException - is an error that is thrown when the server is offline or not reachable

      • getListOfComCompaniesNames

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getListOfComCompaniesNames()
                                                                 throws ServerOfflineException,
                                                                        ServerNotBoundException
        Returns a list of the names of all communication companies in the system.
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of type String, which contains the names of all communication companies currently within the iCrashSystem
        Throws:
        ServerOfflineException - is an error that is thrown when the server is offline or not reachable
        ServerNotBoundException - is only thrown when attempting to access a server which has no current binding. This shouldn't happen, but you never know!

      • getServerState

        public CtState getServerState()
                       throws ServerOfflineException,
                              ServerNotBoundException
        Gets the class type of the server state, this include things like the current server date and time, the last time a reminder was ran and so on.
        Returns:
        The class type of the server state
        Throws:
        ServerOfflineException - Thrown if the server is offline
        ServerNotBoundException - Thrown if the server was not bound correctly in the RMI settings
